posts.title: Tattooed Musc Papi on the L to Brooklyn - M4M - missed connections
posts.body: 06/08: You were a Hispanic (?), Tattooed, Muscular, Silver Fox Papi who I sat beside with on the L. We both were in shorts, got on Union Square, and sat beside each other. Our legs kept touching and at first, I tried to give you some space, but noticed that you didn't mind at all when our legs rubbed against each other. I wanted to tell you that you had goddamn, amazing legs but my nosey family was around. If you're interested in rubbing some more of our body parts, let me know what station I got off at.

posts.title: To the beutiful cashier at bolivar giant eagle on Sunday - missed connections
posts.body: You are beautiful....You were bagging items on Sunday early afternoon.short dark hair, glasses..You are amazing.it was all I could do to say thank you....I would love to get to know you.please contact me

posts.title: Guy in a Yankee jersey Stuck on N train - missed connections
posts.body: We were stuck on a Queens bound N train. You are a male, blondish- reddish hair and beard. Wearing a Yankees jersey and white converse. You were so attractive to me I could hardly control myself in public. God, I wish I worked up the courage to talk to you.

posts.title: Crowded A train - missed connections
posts.body: We were both on a crowded A Train. You were right behind me, literally. I felt the excitement if you know what I mean. You're white, I'm black. Tell me what stop you got off on. M4M
